com.alvermont.terraj.planet.project
Class ProjectionManager

java.lang.Object
  com.alvermont.terraj.planet.project.ProjectionManager

public class ProjectionManager
extends java.lang.Object

Class that manages a list of available projections.

martin

Method Detail

getProjections

public java.util.SortedSet<Projector> getProjections()
Get a set containing all the projections we know about, sorted into alphabetical order

Returns:
A sorted set of the projections this object is managing

addProjection

public void addProjection(Projector proj)
Add a projection to the set being managed

Parameters:
proj - An object that implements the Projector interface that will be added to the available set

removeProjection

public void removeProjection(Projector proj)
Removes a projection from the set being managed

Parameters:
proj - An object that implements the Projector interface that will be removed from the available set

findByName

public Projector findByName(java.lang.String name)
Look up a projection by its name

Parameters:
name - The name of the projection to retrieve
Returns:
The corresponding projection or null if it doesn't exist

getDefaultProjection

public Projector getDefaultProjection()
Get a default projection that can be used e.g. if searches fail

Returns:
A projection object suitable for returning as a default

findByThumbnailName

public Projector findByThumbnailName(java.lang.String name)
Look up a projection by the name of its thumbnail

Parameters:
name - The name of the projection to retrieve
Returns:
The corresponding projection or null if it doesn't exist

formatThumbnailName

public java.lang.String formatThumbnailName(java.lang.String name)
Format a thumbnail fName into a string suitable for use in a call to getResource. If the object does not have a package then we default it to ours and if does not have an extension then we default it to PNG.

Parameters:
name - The fName of the thumbnail
Returns:
A string that can be used to load the thumbnail as a resource
